verses.roman:
so 'pi cakre kumārasya
maṇiṁ krīḍanakaṁ bile
apaśyan bhrātaraṁ bhrātā
satrājit paryatapyata

synonyms: saḥ—he, Jāmbavān; api—moreover; cakre—made; kumārasya—for his child; maṇim—the jewel; krīḍanakam—a toy; bile—in the cave; apaśyan—not seeing; bhrātaram—his brother; bhrātā—the brother; satrājit—Satrājit; paryatapyata—became deeply troubled.
translation: Within the cave Jāmbavān let his young son have the Syamantaka jewel as a toy to play with. Meanwhile Satrājit, not seeing his brother return, became deeply troubled.
